art-is-a-collaborati-andre-gide.author: Andre Gide
art-is-a-collaborati-andre-gide.text: Art is a collaboration between God and the artist, and the less the artist does the better.

before-anything-else-alexander-graham-be.author: Alexander Graham Bell
before-anything-else-alexander-graham-be.text: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.

every-man-dies-not-william-wallace.author: William Wallace
every-man-dies-not-william-wallace.text: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.

people-dont-notice-anton-chekhov.author: Anton Chekhov
people-dont-notice-anton-chekhov.text: People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy.

what-makes-the-deser-antoine-de-saint-ex.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
what-makes-the-deser-antoine-de-saint-ex.text: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.

there-is-a-differenc-simon-sinek.text: There is a difference between listening and waiting for your turn to speak.
there-is-a-differenc-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

the-big-picture-does-simon-sinek.text: The big picture doesn't just come from distance; it also comes from time.
the-big-picture-does-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

directions-are-instr-simon-sinek.text: Directions are instructions given to explain how. Direction is a vision offered to explain why.
directions-are-instr-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

the-cost-of-leadersh-simon-sinek.text: The cost of leadership is self-interest.
the-cost-of-leadersh-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

nike-doesnt-want-to-simon-sinek.text: Nike doesn't want to make products for everyone - they want to make products for champions.
nike-doesnt-want-to-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

people-dont-buy-wha-simon-sinek.text: People don't buy what you do, they buy why you do it.
people-dont-buy-wha-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

its-always-the-orga-simon-sinek.text: It's always the organizations that are resource constrained that come up with the good ideas to win.
its-always-the-orga-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

i-find-when-youre-simon-sinek.text: I find, when you're an optimist, life has a funny way of looking after you.
i-find-when-youre-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

great-leaders-state-simon-sinek.text: Great leaders state out loud what they intend to do and in doing so, they get things done.
great-leaders-state-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

the-trick-to-balance-simon-sinek.text: The trick to balance is to not make sacrificing important things become the norm.
the-trick-to-balance-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

every-one-of-us-has-simon-sinek.text: Every one of us has the capacity to lead.
every-one-of-us-has-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

the-most-basic-human-simon-sinek.text: The most basic human desire is to feel like you belong. Fitting in is important.
the-most-basic-human-simon-sinek.author: Simon Sinek

the-only-thing-neces-edmund-burke.text: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
the-only-thing-neces-edmund-burke.author: Edmund Burke

we-must-develop-and-martin-luther-king-j.text: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
we-must-develop-and-martin-luther-king-j.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

study-nature-love-n-frank-lloyd-wright.text: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
study-nature-love-n-frank-lloyd-wright.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

in-every-walk-with-n-john-muir.text: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
in-every-walk-with-n-john-muir.author: John Muir

look-deep-into-natur-albert-einstein.text: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
look-deep-into-natur-albert-einstein.author: Albert Einstein

if-you-cant-explain-albert-einstein.text: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
if-you-cant-explain-albert-einstein.author: Albert Einstein

life-is-like-riding-albert-einstein.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
life-is-like-riding-albert-einstein.author: Albert Einstein

i-have-no-special-ta-albert-einstein.text: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
i-have-no-special-ta-albert-einstein.author: Albert Einstein

adopt-the-pace-of-na-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
adopt-the-pace-of-na-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

it-is-one-of-the-ble-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
it-is-one-of-the-ble-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

do-not-go-where-the-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
do-not-go-where-the-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

bad-times-have-a-sci-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: Bad times have a scientific value. These are occasions a good learner would not miss.
bad-times-have-a-sci-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

the-only-way-to-have-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
the-only-way-to-have-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

the-greatest-glory-i-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
the-greatest-glory-i-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

people-do-not-seem-t-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: People do not seem to realize that their opinion of the world is also a confession of character.
people-do-not-seem-t-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

the-creation-of-a-th-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: The creation of a thousand forests is in one acorn.
the-creation-of-a-th-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

it-is-not-length-of-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
it-is-not-length-of-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

fear-defeats-more-pe-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
fear-defeats-more-pe-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

a-great-man-is-alway-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: A great man is always willing to be little.
a-great-man-is-alway-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

an-ounce-of-action-i-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.
an-ounce-of-action-i-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

he-who-is-not-everyd-ralph-waldo-emerson.text: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
he-who-is-not-everyd-ralph-waldo-emerson.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

lifes-most-persiste-martin-luther-king-j.text: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
lifes-most-persiste-martin-luther-king-j.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

advice-is-like-snow-samuel-taylor-coleri.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
advice-is-like-snow-samuel-taylor-coleri.text: Advice is like snow - the softer it falls, the longer it dwells upon, and the deeper it sinks into the mind.

every-failure-is-a-s-william-whewell.author: William Whewell
every-failure-is-a-s-william-whewell.text: Every failure is a step to success.

the-actions-of-men-a-james-joyce.author: James Joyce
the-actions-of-men-a-james-joyce.text: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts.

the-great-tragedy-of-thomas-huxley.author: Thomas Huxley
the-great-tragedy-of-thomas-huxley.text: The great tragedy of science - the slaying of a beautiful hypothesis by an ugly fact.

you-can-be-shattered-glennon-doyle-melto.author: Glennon Doyle Melton
you-can-be-shattered-glennon-doyle-melto.text: You can be shattered, and then you can put yourself back together piece by piece. But what can happen over time is this: You wake up one day and realize that you have put yourself back together completely differently. That you are whole, finally, and strong - but you are now a different shape, a different size.

genius-is-the-abilit-f-scott-fitzgerald.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
genius-is-the-abilit-f-scott-fitzgerald.text: Genius is the ability to put into effect what is on your mind.

love-is-a-better-tea-albert-einstein.author: Albert Einstein
love-is-a-better-tea-albert-einstein.text: Love is a better teacher than duty.

never-bend-your-head-helen-keller.author: Helen Keller
never-bend-your-head-helen-keller.text: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.

the-roots-of-all-goo-dalai-lama.author: Dalai Lama
the-roots-of-all-goo-dalai-lama.text: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.

when-your-work-speak-henry-j-kaiser.author: Henry J. Kaiser
when-your-work-speak-henry-j-kaiser.text: When your work speaks for itself, don't interrupt.

art-washes-away-from-pablo-picasso.author: Pablo Picasso
art-washes-away-from-pablo-picasso.text: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.

isnt-it-strange-tha-charles-lindbergh.author: Charles Lindbergh
isnt-it-strange-tha-charles-lindbergh.text: Isn't it strange that we talk least about the things we think about most?

it-is-not-the-creati-margaret-thatcher.author: Margaret Thatcher
it-is-not-the-creati-margaret-thatcher.text: It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake.

the-man-who-has-won-b-c-forbes.author: B. C. Forbes
the-man-who-has-won-b-c-forbes.text: The man who has won millions at the cost of his conscience is a failure.

this-suspense-is-ter-oscar-wilde.author: Oscar Wilde
this-suspense-is-ter-oscar-wilde.text: This suspense is terrible. I hope it will last.

a-fool-can-throw-a-s-saul-bellow.author: Saul Bellow
a-fool-can-throw-a-s-saul-bellow.text: A fool can throw a stone in a pond that 100 wise men can not get out.

an-artist-cannot-fai-charles-horton-cool.author: Charles Horton Cooley
an-artist-cannot-fai-charles-horton-cool.text: An artist cannot fail; it is a success to be one.

i-tell-young-people-hank-aaron.author: Hank Aaron
i-tell-young-people-hank-aaron.text: I tell young people - including my granddaughter - there is no shortcut in life. You have to take it one step at a time and work hard. And you have to give back.

it-doesnt-take-a-lo-j-c-watts.author: J. C. Watts
it-doesnt-take-a-lo-j-c-watts.text: It doesn't take a lot of strength to hang on. It takes a lot of strength to let go.

love-in-its-essence-lucius-annaeus-senec.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
love-in-its-essence-lucius-annaeus-senec.text: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.

there-are-years-that-zora-neale-hurston.author: Zora Neale Hurston
there-are-years-that-zora-neale-hurston.text: There are years that ask questions and years that answer.

we-cannot-despair-of-albert-einstein.author: Albert Einstein
we-cannot-despair-of-albert-einstein.text: We cannot despair of humanity, since we ourselves are human beings.

expect-problems-and-alfred-a-montapert.author: Alfred A. Montapert
expect-problems-and-alfred-a-montapert.text: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.

to-truly-cherish-the-marie-kondo.author: Marie Kondo
to-truly-cherish-the-marie-kondo.text: To truly cherish the things that are important to you, you must first discard those that have outlived their purpose. And if you no longer need them, then that is neither wasteful nor shameful. Can you truthfully say that you treasure something buried so deeply in a cupboard or drawer that you have forgotten its existence?

we-are-all-born-mad-samuel-beckett.author: Samuel Beckett
we-are-all-born-mad-samuel-beckett.text: We are all born mad. Some remain so.

i-was-never-the-smar-jack-welch.author: Jack Welch
i-was-never-the-smar-jack-welch.text: I was never the smartest guy in the room. From the first person I hired, I was never the smartest guy in the room. And that's a big deal. And if you're going to be a leader - if you're a leader and you're the smartest guy in the world - in the room, you've got real problems.

curiosity-will-conqu-james-stephens.author: James Stephens
curiosity-will-conqu-james-stephens.text: Curiosity will conquer fear even more than bravery will.

the-sole-meaning-of-leo-tolstoy.author: Leo Tolstoy
the-sole-meaning-of-leo-tolstoy.text: The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity.

the-urge-to-save-hum-h-l-mencken.author: H. L. Mencken
the-urge-to-save-hum-h-l-mencken.text: The urge to save humanity is almost always a false front for the urge to rule.

everything-that-irri-carl-jung.author: Carl Jung
everything-that-irri-carl-jung.text: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.

it-is-for-others-one-jules-verne.author: Jules Verne
it-is-for-others-one-jules-verne.text: It is for others one must learn to do everything; for there lies the secret of happiness.

nothing-is-as-obnoxi-f-scott-fitzgerald.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
nothing-is-as-obnoxi-f-scott-fitzgerald.text: Nothing is as obnoxious as other people's luck.

woe-to-the-man-whose-joseph-conrad.author: Joseph Conrad
woe-to-the-man-whose-joseph-conrad.text: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.

an-empty-canvas-is-a-wassily-kandinsky.author: Wassily Kandinsky
an-empty-canvas-is-a-wassily-kandinsky.text: An empty canvas is a living wonder... far lovelier than certain pictures.

be-faithful-to-that-andre-gide.author: Andre Gide
be-faithful-to-that-andre-gide.text: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.

if-you-dont-like-th-dolly-parton.author: Dolly Parton
if-you-dont-like-th-dolly-parton.text: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.

life-lived-for-tomor-leo-buscaglia.author: Leo Buscaglia
life-lived-for-tomor-leo-buscaglia.text: Life lived for tomorrow will always be just a day away from being realized.

man-is-so-made-that-jean-de-la-fontaine.author: Jean de La Fontaine
man-is-so-made-that-jean-de-la-fontaine.text: Man is so made that when anything fires his soul, impossibilities vanish.

some-cause-happiness-oscar-wilde.author: Oscar Wilde
some-cause-happiness-oscar-wilde.text: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.

treasure-your-relati-anthony-j-d-angelo.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo
treasure-your-relati-anthony-j-d-angelo.text: Treasure your relationships, not your possessions.

what-is-art-but-a-wa-saul-bellow.author: Saul Bellow
what-is-art-but-a-wa-saul-bellow.text: What is art but a way of seeing?

art-consists-of-limi-gilbert-k-chesterto.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
art-consists-of-limi-gilbert-k-chesterto.text: Art consists of limitation. The most beautiful part of every picture is the frame.

just-because-your-vo-edward-r-murrow.author: Edward R. Murrow
just-because-your-vo-edward-r-murrow.text: Just because your voice reaches halfway around the world doesn't mean you are wiser than when it reached only to the end of the bar.

if-you-have-only-one-maya-angelou.author: Maya Angelou
if-you-have-only-one-maya-angelou.text: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.

if-you-wished-to-be-lucius-annaeus-senec.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
if-you-wished-to-be-lucius-annaeus-senec.text: If you wished to be loved, love.

the-only-way-to-disc-arthur-c-clarke.author: Arthur C. Clarke
the-only-way-to-disc-arthur-c-clarke.text: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.

there-is-no-instinct-lord-byron.author: Lord Byron
there-is-no-instinct-lord-byron.text: There is no instinct like that of the heart.

love-is-our-true-des-thomas-merton.author: Thomas Merton
love-is-our-true-des-thomas-merton.text: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
